subject: Nascar Sprint Cup Series
Daytona 500 (Auto Race)
Automobile Racing
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: Chad Knaus, Jimmie Johnson’s crew chief, receives as much or more credit than Johnson for the success of his race team, which is favored to win a sixth Sprint Cup title this season.
snippet: Chad Knaus, Jimmie Johnson’s crew chief, receives as much or more credit than Johnson for the success of his race team, which is favored to win a sixth Sprint Cup title this season.
